channel.title: Miller's Movie Reviews
channel.description: This is a movie review feed by Mike Miller. I will go through movies that are new each week and let you know a brief description of the movie. I will also give you a link to the homepage to see trailers and more fun content for the movie. Lastly, I will be giving you my personal opinion on each movie. Keep checking back for more.

item.title: Argo
item.description: Argo is a film directed by Ben Afleck. It won Best Picture in the 2013 Oscars. This movie is based off of a CIA agent named Tony Mendez. Mendez specialized in extracting people from dangerous situations. In the movie, Mendez flies to Iran to rescue 5 Americans who were being threatened by the Iranian population. I found the movie to be very entertaining and suspenseful. It is not completely accurate in certain depictions, but Afleck did a great job at recreating actual scenes. While the credits roll, you can see actual footage from the events that took place.
